title: Penalty for Riot glitch
body:
Hi yeah,

I was in lobby and had to trade with first pick but when I alt-tabbed back into league, I encountered one of the client glitches and it froze. Long story short, I didn't wan the game to go through with two players having not swapped because that's bad for everyone in the game right? So I dodged the lobby but because it was glitched, the game still went through. However, I stayed disconnected so my team would be able to "remake" and I would be the only one to lose lp even though I really don't think I should, THEN HOWEVER

Immediately after, I got placed onto a low priority queue for "leaving" too many games ????

Like I just took a bullet for my teammates so I would be the only one to lose lp which I was okay with but then it puts me on low priority q as well for something I couldn't avoid? ie. the awesome client that rito has made somehow glitched out ! it's never glitched out on me before !!!! so it was very surprising !! i tried to do my best so my teammates wouldn't be affected but then it just punished me even more ! LOL
